name: Safe Haven
description: A secure outpost on the ocean planet Salacia with old mines, trepidatious tracks and rickety boardwalks. Strategic cover points and multiple engagement zones.

name: Steaming Stronghold
description: A fortified position surrounded by geothermal vents, offering tactical advantages through steam cover.

name: Arctic Base
description: A frozen military installation with icy terrain that affects movement and visibility. Sub-zero temperatures and unforgiving terrain test every tank.

name: Frozen Research
description: An abandoned research facility in the frozen wastelands, featuring tight corridors and open courtyards.

name: Dragon Cave
description: A volcanic cavern system with narrow passages and lava hazards throughout the battlefield. The spirit of an ancient dragon still resides within.

name: Vault of Value
description: A treasure vault deep within Cacus, featuring valuable control points and tight defensive positions.

name: Jungle Temple
description: An ancient temple hidden in the dense jungles of Silvanus, with vertical gameplay and hidden paths. Wild ruins with pitfalls and poisonous plants.

name: Shrouded Shrine
description: A mystical shrine shrouded in mist, offering limited visibility and ambush opportunities.

name: Death Canyon
description: A treacherous canyon on Earth featuring high walls, narrow chokepoints, and vertical combat. Old west style showdown where scraps will fly and the strongest tanks will stand tall.

name: Forsaken City
description: Urban ruins providing cover through destroyed buildings and abandoned vehicles.

name: Overrun Underpass
description: A highway underpass with multiple levels and vehicular cover points.

name: Shootybooms Shooting Range
description: A combat training facility perfect for testing weapons and practicing tactics.
